title: Rise of the Triad RePack By R.G Revenants NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:
GENERAL INFORMATION:
Released: 2013
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person
Developer: Kylotonn Entertainment
Publisher: Apogee Software
Publication Type: RePack
Platform: PC
Language: English
Language voice: English
Crack: RELOADED

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
Operating system: Windows 8 / Windows 7 SP1 / Windows Vista SP2 / Widows XP SP3
Processor: Intel Dual Core processor with a clock speed of 2.4 GHz
RAM: 2 GB
Video: with 512 MB Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹of video memory (NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT / ATI Radeon HD 3870)
Sound Card: DirectX compatible
Free disk space: 6 GB

DESCRIPTION:
Rise of the Triad is a remake of the first-person shooter Rise of the Triad: Dark War, was released in 1995. The game features an improved 3D world, and is present as a single-player campaign and multiplayer.
in Rise of the Triad you have to play the role of one of five members of the squad HUNT, each of which is unique and has its own style of play. Armed with an impressive arsenal, you go to destroy enemies throughout the 20 levels of the campaign, as well as be able to take part in a variety of multiplayer modes.
In the game you will find a lot of secrets, special events, hidden locations and collectibles. The integrated support for Steamworks, you will have the opportunity to create their own levels, mods and share them with other users.
